jcr:content.jcr:title: Wikipedia:Requests for comment/User conduct disputes archive/Yeti

contentheadline.headline: Wikipedia:Requests for comment/User conduct disputes archive/Yeti

contentrichtext.text: This extremist (see [[Ruthenia]]) is unavailable to rational discourse. A separate article [[Carpathian Ruthenia]] has been created and very carefully worded to be neutral but reflect the mainstream facts on this small ex-Austro-Hungarian, ex-Czechoslovakian province. The Discussion pages and Page history speak for themselves. Some sensible opinion is desperately needed. [[User:Wetman|Wetman]] 18:20, 1 Feb 2004 (UTC) I suppose that lecture of the article about [[Carpathian Ruthenia]], history of [[Ruthenia]] page and discussion under these articles will enable the users to work out who is not able to "rational discourse". [[User:Yeti]] 18:43, 1 Feb 2004 (UTC)
